verbose_text: Mechanistically, we found that tyrosine protein phosphatase non receptor type 2 (PTPN2, TC45) and protein phosphatase 2A (PP2A) form a complex with RelA (p65) to mediate its dephosphorylation whereas GdX interrupts the TC45 / PP2A / p65 complex formation and restrict p65 dephosphorylation by trapping TC45.
evidence: p65) to mediate its dephosphorylation whereas GdX interrupts the TC45/PP2A/p65 complex formation and restrict p65 dephosphorylation
